snippet: Canadian Justice Lynn Smith declared the ban invalid, but also suspended her ruling for one year to give Canada’s federal Parliament time to draft legislation with her ruling in mind.
lead_paragraph: Canadian Justice Lynn Smith declared the ban invalid, but also suspended her ruling for one year to give Canada’s federal Parliament time to draft legislation with her ruling in mind.

headline.main: Canada: Court Says Ban on Doctor-Assisted Suicide Is Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Canada: Court Says Ban on Doctor-Assisted Suicide Is Unconstitutional
